meta.description: A WordPress Playground site preloaded with thousands of users for testing.
meta.author: sajjad47

steps.code: <?php include '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; $count = 10000; $roles = array( 'subscriber', 'editor', 'author', 'contributor' ); $domain = 'example.com'; for ( $i = 1; $i <= $count; $i++ ) { $role = $roles[ array_rand( $roles ) ]; $username = $role . $i; $email = $role . $i . '@' . $domain; $password = wp_generate_password( 12, false ); if ( ! username_exists( $username ) && ! email_exists( $email ) ) { wp_create_user( $username, $password, $email ); $user = get_user_by( 'login', $username ); $user->set_role( $role ); } }
